languages.text: "Кровавая паутина ведает способами как истязать плоть и не отправляться к Неумирающему раньше срока. Домин, позволь помочь кардиналу Анвиласу обрясть просветление и познать чистоту предсмертного состояния. Пройдя наш обряд, да осознает он, что не в его власти оборвать свою нить".

"The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."
languages.original_text: "Кровавая паутина ведает способами как истязать плоть и не отправляться к Неумирающему раньше срока. Домин, позволь помочь кардиналу Анвиласу обрясть просветление и познать чистоту предсмертного состояния. Пройдя наш обряд, да осознает он, что не в его власти оборвать свою нить".

Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not up to him to sever his own thread."

languages.text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz kennt Wege, das Fleisch zu foltern, ohne vorzeitig vor den Todlosen zu treten. Domin, lasst uns Kardinal Anvylas helfen, Erleuchtung zu finden und die Reinheit einer Nahtoderfahrung zu erleben. Wenn er sich unserem Ritus unterzieht, wird er erkennen, dass es ihm nicht gegeben ist, seinen eigenen Faden zu durchtrennen."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: "Das Blutgesponnene Netz kennt Wege, das Fleisch zu foltern, ohne vorzeitig vor den Todlosen zu treten. Domin, lasst uns Kardinal Anvylas helfen, Erleuchtung zu finden und die Reinheit einer Nahtoderfahrung zu erleben. Wenn er sich unserem Ritus unterzieht, wird er erkennen, dass es ihm nicht gegeben ist, seinen eigenen Faden zu durchtrennen."

languages.text: « La Toile de Sang sait mieux que personne tourmenter la chair d'un supplicié sans l'expédier prématurément auprès de l'Immortel. Domin, permettez-nous d'aider le cardinal Anvylas à atteindre l'illumination et à connaître la pureté qu'on ne trouve qu'aux portes de la mort. En se soumettant à notre rite, il comprendra que ce n'est pas à lui de trancher son propre fil. »
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: « La Toile de Sang sait mieux que personne tourmenter la chair d'un supplicié sans l'expédier prématurément auprès de l'Immortel. Domin, permettez-nous d'aider le cardinal Anvylas à atteindre l'illumination et à connaître la pureté qu'on ne trouve qu'aux portes de la mort. En se soumettant à notre rite, il comprendra que ce n'est pas à lui de trancher son propre fil. »

languages.text: “织血罗网知道如何折磨肉体，而又不会让遭到折磨的人在大限到来之前见到不死之神。秘者，请允许我们协助红衣主教安维拉斯获得启迪，体验濒死边缘的纯洁状态。只要让他参加我们的仪式，他应该就能意识到，他无权切断自己的丝线。”
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: “织血罗网知道如何折磨肉体，而又不会让遭到折磨的人在大限到来之前见到不死之神。秘者，请允许我们协助红衣主教安维拉斯获得启迪，体验濒死边缘的纯洁状态。只要让他参加我们的仪式，他应该就能意识到，他无权切断自己的丝线。”

languages.text: «La Red Sanguinolenta conoce las formas de atormentar la carne sin enviar el alma ante el Inmortal antes de tiempo. Domin, permítanos ayudar al cardenal Anvylas a alcanzar la iluminación y experimentar la pureza de un estado cercano a la muerte. Nuestro ritual le hará comprender que no le corresponde a él cortar su propio hilo».
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: «La Red Sanguinolenta conoce las formas de atormentar la carne sin enviar el alma ante el Inmortal antes de tiempo. Domin, permítanos ayudar al cardenal Anvylas a alcanzar la iluminación y experimentar la pureza de un estado cercano a la muerte. Nuestro ritual le hará comprender que no le corresponde a él cortar su propio hilo».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、しかるべき時が来る前に、不死の者のもとへ送ることなく、肉体を苦しめる術に長けています。ドミンよ、私たちにアンビラス枢機卿が啓示を得て、臨死の純粋なる境地を体験する手助けをさせてください。私たちの儀式を経れば、彼も自らの糸を断つことが自身の権能ではないと悟るでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブは、しかるべき時が来る前に、不死の者のもとへ送ることなく、肉体を苦しめる術に長けています。ドミンよ、私たちにアンビラス枢機卿が啓示を得て、臨死の純粋なる境地を体験する手助けをさせてください。私たちの儀式を経れば、彼も自らの糸を断つことが自身の権能ではないと悟るでしょう」

languages.text: "Kanipi Ağı, kişinin bedenini Ölmeyen'e vakitsizce yürütmeyecek işkence yöntemleri bilir. Müsaade et, Kardinal Anvylas'a aydınlanmayı ve ölüme yakınlığın saflığını yaşatalım Domin. Ayinimiz sayesinde kendi ipini kesmenin haddi olmadığını da fark edecektir."
languages.original_text: "The Bloodspun Web is knowledgeable in ways to torment one's flesh without going to the Undying One before due time. Domin, allow us to help Cardinal Anvylas attain enlightenment and experience the purity of a near-death state. Undergoing our rite should make him realise it is not in his gift to sever his own thread."

traits.locale_text: "Kanipi Ağı, kişinin bedenini Ölmeyen'e vakitsizce yürütmeyecek işkence yöntemleri bilir. Müsaade edin, Kardinal Anvylas'a aydınlanmayı ve ölüme yakınlığın saflığını yaşatalım Domin. Ayinimiz sayesinde kendi ipini kesmenin haddi olmadığını da fark edecektir."
